text: But it isn't good. At the moment, BinaryBuilder works correctly only on a narrow closed interval of revisions in the release-1.6 branch

elements.text: But it isn't good. At the moment, BinaryBuilder works correctly only on a narrow closed interval of revisions in the release-1.6 branch

text: ok that explains the requirement restrictions I saw. Is it due to a new julia features constraining the julia version to be >= 1.6?

elements.text: ok that explains the requirement restrictions I saw. Is it due to a new julia features constraining the julia version to be >= 1.6?

text: yes, but then newer features broke the JLLs that are also dependencies of julia itself, what you're seeing now

elements.text: yes, but then newer features broke the JLLs that are also dependencies of julia itself, what you're seeing now

text: Elliot has PRs to fix this, but it'll take some days before they'll be merged (in Julia and BinaryBuilder)
